attributes.action: Stop the plan to allow councils to charge people to park outside their own homes based on carbon dioxide emissions
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
It is disgusting that drivers will be hit by another tax.
We pay enough with road tax and the very high rate of fuel duty we pay.
Not including toll roads and congestion charging which should also not be allowed.
Charging £300 to park a car outside your own home is ludicrous especially since a car that is parked is not producing any emissions.
People who buy bigger engine cars are paying more in tax already due to the higher fuel consumption.
Leave the motorist alone!!

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Stop the plan to allow councils to charge people to park outside their own homes based on carbon dioxide emissions."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page14646.asp

Prime Minister's Office
